General.Name: Changchun Gas Co Ltd
General.Description: Changchun Gas Co,.Ltd produces and sells natural gas in China. It also engages in the production and sale of gas appliances; supply of liquefied petroleum gas; refueling of automobiles; installation of gas engineering; sale of gas direct-fired air conditioners; and real estate leasing activities. The company was founded in 1924 and is headquartered in Changchun, China. Changchun Gas Co,.Ltd is a subsidiary of Changchun Changgang Gas Co., Ltd.
